name: The Home Depot
description: Chain home improvement retailer for tools, appliances & other products (some offer truck rentals).
address: The Home Depot, 2700 Sweden Way, Richmond, BC V6V 1K1

featured_reviews.review_id: Have a great experience at this location . The manager Yak was very nice and knowledgeable. His team was very helpful. I have been looking for a patio set for a while but couldn't find anything I like. Once I saw this set , I fell in love and wanted it in my home right away . My car was too small to fit the big box , Yak was able to arrange fast shipping, and I was able to get it the next day . I was not sure about this set, and Yak gave me his honest opinion. The set is high quality  and very comfortable.  I love it.  Thank you, Yak and his team.  Highly recommend homedepot, especially this location.
featured_reviews.review_text: Have a great experience at this location . The manager Yak was very nice and knowledgeable. His team was very helpful. The set is high quality  and very comfortable.  I love it.  Thank you, Yak and his team.  Highly recommend homedepot, especially this location.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Rented a sander and my experience was less than expectations. they did not add a required extension cord (different connection), didn't answer the phone, told me to come back to get the extension cord and seemed completely indifferent to my plight. I talked to the store manager who also seemed indifferent and was offered $30 off for my time. I lost half a day running around so the offer was basically not to charge me for the time they wasted on me. Might be an anomaly, make sure you have been given all parts before leaving store.

Edit/update. Hey HD. Your training program is awful. 4 people trying to help me buy a hot water tank and get install. 30 minutes later, I ask about my pro points and they say they don't know. I will check with some other places since I left without being asked to pay for anything.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello, Thank you for bringing this to our attention, we would like to hear more about this experience.  Please reach out to us by private message at https://thd.co/3iepTKq or DM @homedepotcanada on Twitter or Instagram so that we can continue the conversation. -CU

featured_reviews.review_id: If you're looking to spruce up your home decor, this is a great place to check out.
featured_reviews.review_text: If you're looking to spruce up your home decor, this is a great place to check out.

featured_reviews.review_id: Worst customer service. How much you can be rude to the customer paying a couple of thousands dollars....Many staff there but all of them are busy all the time. You ask for assistance and every time they say wait for a minutes then never show up. I have to ask 3-4 different staffs and if you are lucky, you'll get help after waiting for at least 30 minutes. Usually I never post bad reviews but I'm really upset that staff cut my baseboard wrong size yesterday. This guy( bold head, rude) don't even listen to you carefully when I was telling him the size of cuts. Now what? I have to go back to customer service and explain what happen for refund and redone another cut? How much I have to waste my time to get my job done with this Home Depot.I  spend so much money but this Home Depot screw you up.

featured_reviews.review_id: Customer service manager Jazz and staff Simran at Store #7043 helped me a lot today. Simran was really patient and kind, She listened me very carefully and provided me solutions to my problem. Her working attitude was serious, and she made me feeling warm and CARED! Jazz is a wonderful customer service manager. He was patient too and reliable! I was a little disappointed with the product i purchased But my experience today made me trust the Home Depot! I will choose the Home Depot again!

featured_reviews.review_id: I bought a dishwasher from yourselves great service with the delivery .The nightmare started with the installation. First attempt the installer got the area wrong and said it was not his area .Second attempt a so called rushed installation another no show .After an hour on the phone .We learned he had another emergency and he would book sometime next week .Please look at your installers Quick contractor's totally useless.We have decided to cancel and find our own contractor .

featured_reviews.review_id: Very good hardware store with reasonable prices and offers. If you want anything related and from dewalt, the Home Depot is the best place you can get it from.
featured_reviews.review_text: Very good hardware store with reasonable prices and offers. If you want anything related and from dewalt, the Home Depot is the best place you can get it from.

featured_reviews.review_id: In the summer, this is one of my favourite places to take my mom and get her something. Staff here speak a multitude of languages and are super kind.
featured_reviews.review_text: In the summer, this is one of my favourite places to take my mom and get her something. Staff here speak a multitude of languages and are super kind.
